resources.string:
SOME INSTRUCTIONS

 SCREEN LOCK: while playing a video, thanks to the central button, it is possible to block accidental touches to the screen by reducing the brightness to minimum to increase battery life.

 PLAYBACK: the function is available by pressing the home button on the phone, showing the currently playing content in the bubble. Music control is achieved by reopening the application.

 DELETION: deleting playlists or songs is done with a long click. NB: for history videos you must do this on the main screen and not on the player screen.

 PLAYLISTS: adding songs is possible thanks to the button at the top right of the video player.
DATA INFO\n\n Some data may be manipulated by the owner of the API, i.e. Youtube, as indicated in the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
Are you sure you want to delete this item?

The application uses the YouTube API service, before continuing please view and accept the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy

All users have reached the daily request limit.
 Requests will be available again at midnight Los Angeles time.


In the meantime, you can go to YouTube, tap Share on a video, and choose "Others" > "RYTM" to keep listening.
Do you like RYTM? Support me on Buy Me a Coffee ‚òï
Welcome in RYTM, the app where you can see a youtube videos without ads and more‚Ä¶

1. Search videos or paste the link in searchbar

2. You can create playlists to organise your videos

3. You have the history of your research

1. Add a video to your playlist.

3. Long-press to organize and swipe to delete

4. Lock the screen to avoid accidental touches

5. Set a timer if you want to fall asleep with a video
Watch your videos while you use others apps
Try to minimize the app, you can continue to see the video while do other things
Sometimes, if a lot of users use my app, the requests can end up. In this case you can open videos directly from official app! You have to click share > other > RYTM and voil√†

By setting the app to the video\\\'s original language, AI dubbing will disappear. You can also now enable automatic saving of video progress!
